app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Photo Editor Effects Filters
app_description: Simple yet powerful Photo Editor makes it easy to edit your favorite pics the way you like. Our huge collection of filters and effects is designed to make any picture stand out: try it yourself! Ready to take your photos to the next level Use our app to edit any pic of yours and make it unique. Did you know that we offer over 300 exclusive effects and filters to do that Wicked! Here s a complete list of all the powerful photo editing tools that you will find on the app. TRENDY FILTERS Get access to over 300 filters thoughtfully designed by professional photographers. SPECIAL EFFECTS Apply chromatic aberration color shift distortions tv glitch VHS oil painting paper drawing blur broken glass and other cool effects to create extraordinary photos that will catch everyone s eye. OVERLAY TEXTURES Add light leak lens flare confetti glitter firework fire rainbow dust grain scratches rain show fog and mist textures to make your photos even more special. COOL STICKERS Is it even a photo editor if there are no stickers Get access to a huge selection of realistic and cartoon stickers that you won t find anywhere else. BACKGROUND EDITING Add beautiful frames to your pictures and choose from 90 stunning backgrounds geometric watercolor floral cosmic marble wood etc. . TEXT EDITOR Add text to your photo and customize it with over 60 unique fonts. You can also adjust the text color spacing and alignment and choose among 30 beautiful text arts. ADJUSTMENTS Enhance the quality of your photos with our professional tools: exposure contrast hue saturation sharpness vibrance gamma temperature tint shadows highlights grain and vignette. EASY BEFORE AND AFTER While editing you can instantly compare the adjusted or edited photo with the original. VIDEO FX EFFECTS Bring motion magic to your still photos: create a short video out of a picture. Choose among 10 video effects: rain snow movie VHS tv glitch water drop and more. You can also export your video in HD format: cool right MORE COOL FEATURES Instantly share your edited photos to social media such as Instagram TikTok Snapchat and Facebook. What are you waiting for Join thousands of people who use our Photo Editor every day to make their pictures stand out! If you re enjoying Photo Editor then please leave a review! You ll make us happy and help others discover your favorite photo editing app. Terms of Use: https: bit.ly 3YV6Bxe Privacy Policy: https: bit.ly 3TvR8Tl Have a feature request you would like to see in a future version of the app Do not hesitate to contact us at vinci bussola.tech.
